pageContext.collection_title: Chamber Music from Spoleto Festival USA
pageContext.collection_description: Recordings of concerts from the Spoleto Festival USA, Charleston, SC, Chamber Music Series. Also, completed broadcast programs recorded for national distribution. Also some local news coverage

pageContext.collection_notes: VHS tapes include both SVHS tapes and Digital (PCM) recordings on VHS
